course_title: Evidence-Based Decision Making with Principal Focus on Immunization, Infectious and Chronic Diseases
course_description: This course is designed to provide an overview of these processes and related deliberative bodies to help future public health professionals understand how their research and practice are used in evidence-based decision making.
